articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
Making money playing games?
Sounds awesome! 🤩
But does it work? 🤔

Ini Abasi Ekanem: 🔷🔹Leveling up with Blockchain Gaming 🔹🔷
Blockchain gaming has transformed gamers into earners💰
Imagine a gaming universe where players own their in-game assets, transparency and security are non-negotiable, and the gaming experience is better than traditional platforms.
🧵
articles.title: Making money playing games? Sounds awesome! 🤩 But does it work? 🤔

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
What do blockchains add to gaming?

🆅🅸🅺🆃🅷🅾🆁: #30daysoftext Day 7
𝗕𝗹𝗼𝗰𝗸𝗰𝗵𝗮𝗶𝗻 𝗚𝗮𝗺𝗶𝗻𝗴
Blockchain Gaming is the Integration of web2 games into the blockchain which enables new gameplay mechanics, enables ownership of in-game assets, and creates a more decentralized gaming ecosystem.
articles.title: What do blockchains add to gaming?

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
Do you think web3 gaming is the future? 🤔

Patrick Skinner (🧱, 🚀): #30daysoftext @developer_dao
🎮 The landscape of #Web3 gaming is evolving!
We need to completely do away with the 'Play-to-Earn' approach. Let's dive into why the industry is shifting towards a 'Play AND Earn' model. 🌐🕹️
🧵 (1/9)
articles.title: Do you think web3 gaming is the future? 🤔

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
Who built something LIT lately? 🔥

Patrick Skinner (🧱, 🚀): #30daysoftext @developer_dao 
@LitProtocol is not a protocol to sleep on. 
It's a decentralized key management network, changing how we approach dApp security, data privacy, and user autonomy in Web3. Here's why it's my favorite... 
👇👇
(1/8)
articles.title: Who built something LIT lately? 🔥

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
Re @PSkinnerTech knows something about wallets!
... his AI game is on point too 👀

Patrick Skinner (🧱, 🚀): 🚀 Let's dive into why setting up token allowances with @zerion Wallet is crucial for your Web3 security. 
First off, what's a token allowance? It's your permission for a dApp to use your tokens - a standard feature of ERC-20 tokens.
#30daysoftext @developer_dao 
(1/8)
articles.title: Re @PSkinnerTech knows something about wallets! ... his AI game is on point too 👀
